overview: Starstruck lovers Paula Sky and Kristof Cale hold hands as they take a romantic walk around their holiday ski lodge. It's their first weekend away together, and they can't keep their hands off each other! After stopping on the path to kiss, Paula takes Kristof's cock out of his pants and softly licks it, with the snow-capped mountains as backdrop. Unable to wait any longer, Paula brings Kristof back inside to show him her promised surprise. Descending the stairs in see-through lingerie and high heels, Paula is an angelic vision. Kristof can't wait to lick her soft pussy, to run his hands over her perky breasts. To end their perfect weekend in the forest, the pair make love slowly on the stairs, and Paula drinks up every last drop of Kristof's pearly white cum.
title: More Than Words
